title: Setsuna’s Recommendation!
detail_text: <:th_ch0001/>Hey, hey, Setsuna-chan, Rin-chan said, “The anime that Setsuna-san recommended me was really interesting nya” the other day~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0207/>Waaah, really!?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0001/>She also said, “Setsuna-san is really good at giving recommendations nya”, so if you have any recommendations for me, can you let me know?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0207/>Fufu, it’s kind of embarrassing to be called a good recommender. A recommendation for Honoka-san.... Let’s see....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0001/>Yeah, yeah! ....Wait, Setsuna-chan, why do you look so serious?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0207/>I have quite a hard time making recommendations. I need to consider both the quality of the work and your tastes, Honoka-san. Do you have any tropes that you like? Something like a heated battle or a passionate friendship....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0001/>Hmm, let’s see.... I guess I like stories about friends working together. I can totally relate to those.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0207/>In that case, I can narrow it down to three series. If you like, how about we watch them at my place?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0001/>Eeh, can I!?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0207/>Yes! Let’s buy some snacks and have a watch party!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0001/>I want to buy bread too!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
